channel.title: Anyone interested in helping make a coop map?
channel.description: I was testing NPCs & A.I. logics in multiplayer, and it seems stable. Rather than spend 5 months myself (I tend to burnout rather quickly), I figure a team could knock out a decently-long cooperative map in a month or so. Just drop me a line if you are interested :slight_smile:
